sentence: However the drinks were pleasant and the environment relaxing
A really pleasant experience room was nice and quiet service was good food was good
The room had two queen sized beds that were exceedingly comfortable in fact the most comfortable hotel bed we have ever experienced

The best hotel i ve been to so far the key card situation is kind of screw ball but other than that it was really awesome great environment i would recommend this place to anyone who is tring to relax
Staff is amazing atmosphere amazing beds are heaven and the property exquisite
Really comfy bed and pillows spacious rooms with a relaxing environment clean and open bathrooms with good tub and shower fantastic event conference rooms and a great bar
THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH FOR THE JOY OF A ONCE IN A LIFETIME EXPERIENCE
Ida my server made the dining experience enjoyable and personable service a solid time
If would be worth a visit to this property to just have the experience of what I am attempting to communicate here
They do nt have the basics in the room eg a shower cap or lotion very basic and quite disappointing considering the experiences one would have in other Sheratons around the world
A non existent bell man was also our experience and we had to carry roll our bags quite a distance before we reached check in on the second floor and then all the way to our room
Elevators need signage that indicate which elevators go to ground level but otherwise an overall great experience
That breakfast experience leaves a lot to be desired even on the midst of all the other great qualities of the hotel

The atmosphere was so loud we asked for the music to be tuned down and although they did it somewhat we were told that they needed to keep the lounge atmosphere even though the resturaunt customers outnumbered the lounge customers about 4 to 1

Just left the Sheraton Phoenix Downtown after staying for 4 days and my experience was dreadful as to my surprise I was expecting exceptional service because we have stayed at many hotels during our travels but it started off with us not because greeted upon check in then we get up to our room only to notice they booked us in a 2 person room with 5 of us that we booked for and it was very clear we had a wheelchair and 5 people then we head down to fix the issue very respectful ask for them to fix it and they could not until the next day so my daughter had to sleep on the floor and keep in mind my daughter is in a wheelchair that will explain why we booked the big room to begin with then the wrong room we had to sleep in for the night was so dirty and keep in mind I am not a crybaby and never have to complain I was a hotel bed and breakfast manager for many years so I know how hard it is but our room was very dirty and did not smell clean when we walked in trash was left on the bottom counter in the bathroom and there was dirt and hair all over the counters and floors then i went to lay down only to find the night stand headboards lamps and all cover with heavy dust I did take video and pictures of all of it the hotel itself is looking very worn down and old dirty
Room service did not even leave soap shampoo or conditioner in my room second day toilet had yellow pee stain really unacceptable experience will never stay here
